See the results from the Greenland isotope core samples. The world has cycles as it has since it’s start, there’s a graph showing weather patterns (caused by these cycles) starting from in the hundreds of thousands to present day. It even shows interruptions where the earth has suffered big catastrophe’s ie around 11600 years ago we suffered a strike by a large meteor or comet and this shows up on the graph by an 18c jump in global temperatures, its thought to be what ended the last ice age. The scientists drilled down something like 2 miles into the Greenland ice cap over 5 years and this is what they’ve found by studying the layers of the core samples. It’s not something we’re going to stop from happening. We still do need to live cleaner and look after the planet a lot more than we do for lots of reason but we won’t have an effect on the cycles of the earth, and I believe that’s what we’re experiencing. have a look into it!

 JR podcast had one with a guy called Randall Carlson he’s brilliant. I believe it’s around the 20min mark.

Wake up world!
